claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: The image is the header of a CDC Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR) Recommendations and Reports document, displaying the CDC logo, the large ‘MMWR’ title, volume and issue information, and the date August 26, 2022. does not support the claim because the image only shows the report cover header and contains no information about flu vaccine production methods, mutations, or effectiveness. Note: Only the document header is visible; no substantive content or data is provided in the image.
